description:
We recently converted from `message` to `msg_fmt` in `nova/exception.py`.

Looks like this class was missed.
title: CellUpdateUnsupported still overrides `message`

comments.content:
We recently converted from `message` to `msg_fmt` in `nova/exception.py`.

Looks like this class was missed.

commit 388187144dc59d48730ad5815bf1d2b0f517bc92
Author: Rick Harris <email address hidden>
Date:   Wed Jul 17 15:31:38 2013 +0000

    Missed message -> msg_fmt conversion
    
    We recently changed NovaException's to define `msg_fmt` instead of `message`
    on the class. Looks like this exception was missed for some reason.
    
    Fixes bug 1202255
    
    Change-Id: If828bf42fa077665d1d92e08758fbddd342ab626
